description:
Thanks to Doron and his drone friends, Berry, Hack, and Finn are able to reach Mark Twain, a strange facility floating in the sky. By using the Angelfish club card they had previously obtained, they manage to get inside, where Berry and Hack enter Mark Twain`s rendition of the Hyperverse. What they discover appears to be a labyrinth. Knowing that all the secrets of Tom Sawyer island must be contained within, Berry and Hack start searching for Phantom Zero`s identity.
Source: Crunchyroll
